availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel McClelland Moore (Covington, Kentucky, circuit judge)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, circuit judge. Bourbon County, Kentucky native. Married to Martha Wilson in Butler, Ohio on March 15, 1842. Father of Margaret Moore, Robert Moore, Samuella Moore, James C. Moore, French Moore, Rosena B. Moore, and Nora Moore, Attorney in Covington, Kentucky in 1850. Made ruling elder in Second Presbyterian Church of Covington, Kentucky in 1854. Kenton County Circuit judge in 1856. Attorney in Covington in 1860.
